title: Intersectional expertise is a super power
summary: Being T-shaped around the flux of evolving technologies is extremely rare and allows us to deliver orders of magnitude more value.

title: Teaching, practicing, sharing
summary: Being a 100% practitioner driven setup, allows us to build highly artisanal guilds with real mastery over craft. Teaching (the community) and sharing (OSS/libre) reinforces this culture.

title: Seek simplicty & elegance, relentlessly
summary: Complexity is a disease. We (often) operate in a contrasting world of super-reductionist concretions and needless abstractions. Navigating this requires a principled approach, while understanding boundaries of the domain.

title: Keep it flat. Stay lean, stay young
summary: No delusions of building or scaling factories. No bulking & cutting cycles. A pursuit of achieving the highest level of skill attainable in a given context.
